Hey, I'm Moses!
Yale University BA Political Science
About Me
Moses Cho served in the U.S. Marine Corps from 2010-2014 as an Amphibious Assault Vehicle Technician. Upon completion of his military service, he returned home to San Jose, California, and attended De Anza Community College. With the help of Service to School, Moses matriculated to Yale in fall of 2016. He is the current President of the Eli Whitney Student Society and is adamantly working with various student groups to promote veteran integration on campus. Moses interned at J.P. Morgan in the Global Wealth Management department during the summer of 2017 and plans to pursue a career in finance.
